reviewText: I was familiar with these true crime stories, so I enjoyed the movies very much.  They were well done, what I consider quality production, with great casting.

Great actors like Al Pacino, Marlon Brando, Jane Fonda, Angie Dickinson, and many more....over 8 hours of great entertainment. .Suspenxe, Action, Drama...
Great price for four great Hollywood Classics.
All 6 of these movies are really good.  All true...so that makes it very interesting.  Saying that, they of course are all sad, but any true crime movie is good.
